title: Bokura No Himitsu O Kyouyuu Shiyou Ka
alternative_title: ボクらの秘密を共有しようか ; Bokura no Himitsu wo Kyouyuu Shiyou ka ; Bokura no Himitsu wo Kyouyuu shiyou ka? ; Colorful Shounen to Monochrome na Atashi ; Itoshi no Hime-chan
status: ボクらの秘密を共有しようか ; Bokura no Himitsu wo Kyouyuu Shiyou ka ; Bokura no Himitsu wo Kyouyuu shiyou ka? ; Colorful Shounen to Monochrome na Atashi ; Itoshi no Hime-chan
description:
Description :
        From Intercross:

Yuka goes to Ikimonogakari's room to ask them to solve her love problem, but unfortunately, they couldn't help her. To make her feel better, the people in the club gives her a piece of candy. Yuka eats it, and she suddenly gets cat ears and a tail! What happened to her? Will she ever go back to normal?

[T/N: Ikimonogakari literally means "(person) in charge of living beings]

2. Colorful Shounen to Monochrome na Atashi
Naoki and Kiyo have known each other for a long time because they live in the same apartment complex. One Valentine's Day, Kiyo gave Naoki a chocolate cake, but Naoki threw it away and laughed it off. Because of that, Kiyo doesn't make sweets anymore! Because Naoki's dad is Kiyo's dad's boss and they are going on a trip, Kiyo has to make food for Naoki. Will Kiyo re-live the trauma of the past?

3. Kaibutsu-kun ni Rei
The first person Yuka and her friend meet at a sports' camp is Kidou-kun, the school 'monster'. Yuka is the only one not scared of him... in fact she falls in love with him. After an incident, Kidou becomes popular... how can Yuka make him notice her? And what if Kidou isn't the only 'monster' in school?

4. Itoshi no Himeko-chan
Anri, who is usually bad at handling boys, is asked out by the school's most attractive guy, Takuma! This is so she can gradually get used to guys, however, does Takuma have another agenda in play? What is going to happen between the two?

5. Shiro no Kiseki
